questions.question: What is the capital of France?
What is WAISE?
questions.expected_answer: WAISE is a project that aims to develop an AI-powered search engine integrating with platforms like XWiki. The core of the project is a WAISE server, which will provide context-based answers using Large Language Models (LLMs) based on indexed content.

questions.question: What was the hottest year on record?
What is the boiling point of water in Celsius?
